Articles.Content:
so i have been working on making a new set of landing gear. but i have been running into a few problems with the animation.

my animation is made in 3ds max and then i pull the part into unity and using the parts tool i export it.

my animation only works when retracting the gear, and only with the right-click GUI. so i cant extend it or use the "G" key.

for the animation i followed a tutorial somewhere on this site, where i called the animation "retract" and i got to the point where i was able to retract the gear.

but now iam stuck.

do anyone have an idea of what to do now?
